content: A covered transaction, as defined in the proposed RESTRICT Act, refers to any transaction that could result in the control, acquisition, merger, investment in, or bankruptcy of any entity that produces, designs, tests, manufactures, fabricates, or develops information and communication technology products or services. Covered transactions also include any purchase or lease by or to any entity that is engaged in producing, designing, testing, manufacturing, fabricating, or developing information and communication technology products or services that is conducted by any person subject to the jurisdiction of the United States, including a foreign person.
